about_the_game:
You are a bug, and bugs gotta eat. Work with your friends to find and eat enough food to survive, or simply eat your friends to survive.

You Are Bugs is a multiplayer PvP bug game, Predators vs Prey. As a Prey bug, you must work with your fellow bugs to collect food and return it to the nest. Various species like Ants, Flies, and Snails offer different strategies, but teamwork is required to succeed.

As a Predator, your goal is simple. Find and hunt down the Prey before they collect enough food and burrow into the nest for good. Species such as the Spider and Wasp hunt effectively on their own, but are extremely dangerous when coordinating.

Be A Bug

Climb on anything and everything in your pursuit of food. Bugs have sticky feet, so nearly every surface in the game can be traversed.

Find Food

All bugs need food to survive. Some eat poop, some eat other bugs. Which are you?

Work Together

The life of one individual ant does not matter. What matters is the colony. Rally with your fellow bugs!

As a Predator, your goal is simple. Find and hunt down the Prey before they collect enough food and burrow into the nest for good. Species such as the Spider and Wasp hunt effectively on their own, but are extremely dangerous when coordinating.

name: You Are Bugs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: dual core 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel hd 520
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: You Are Bugs is a team-based multiplayer PvP game. Work together as Prey bugs to find and collect enough food to survive. Or play as a Predator bug and eat the others to survive.
